biography: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia  Hubertus Bengsch (born 10 July 1952 in Berlin) is a German actor, best known for his role as the German First Officer (1WO) in Das Boot. He also is well known for being the German voice of American actor Richard Gere.
name: Hubertus Bengsch

cast.title: Heil Hitler, das Schwein ist tot! - Humor unterm Hakenkreuz
